driverQueries.driverLogin: SELECT * FROM DriverDetails WHERE DriverEmail = ? AND DriverPassword = ?
driverQueries.getDriverAssignedTrips: SELECT c.* FROM cabAllocationML c JOIN DriverDetails d ON d.VehicleId = c.VehicleId WHERE d.DriverId = ?
driverQueries.getDriverHistory: SELECT t.TripId, t.TripDate, ca.PriorityOrder, cb.EmployeeName, cb.EmployeeAddress, t.StartTime, t.EndTime  FROM tripmanagement t JOIN cabbookingtable cb ON t.BookingId = cb.BookingId JOIN caballocationml ca ON ca.BookingId = cb.BookingId JOIN driverdetails d ON d.VehicleId = ca.VehicleId WHERE d.DriverId = ? ORDER BY ca.PriorityOrder ASC
